Text:
The Bureau of Reclamation's initial 2022 water supply allocation is a devastating blow to small community agricultural producers throughout the Central Valley. #CA21

My full statement on @usbr's announcement: 
https://t.co/cFPQYaYBgy

Burdensome government regulations and failed policies are increasing energy costs for families in the Central Valley and across the country. We need to cut the red tape and allow the U.S. to once again become energy independent. https://t.co/qB2QCp1FL9
Happy Presidents' Day! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/Rn6iRl2HsR

Agriculture is the backbone of our Central Valley economy, and we rely on the next generation to keep this industry strong. I’m proud to cosponsor a resolution recognizing #FFAWeek and FFA’s important role in shaping future agriculture leaders. https://t.co/dQQ2cNgZ76
I enjoyed stopping by the Shafter Learning Center this week to tour their facilities and hear more about their work to provide educational resources to our community. #CA21 https://t.co/XZcuNixwP3

I was happy to visit Tipton Elementary School to talk to their Director of Operations about adjustments they’ve made during the pandemic. I also had the chance to answer some questions about government from an 8th grade history class! https://t.co/OLhfjnIXNW

I am saddened to hear of the passing of my colleague @RepHagedorn. Jim was a true public servant. Terra and I are praying for Jim’s wife Jennifer, his family, loved ones, and staff during this difficult time.

Our farm workers are critical to feeding America. Today I joined @USDA Rural Development Administrator Joaquin Altoro in Parlier to tour a farm worker housing facility and discuss the need for improved farm worker housing in the Central Valley. https://t.co/Ac4MzcBRlk

Had a productive conversation with Shafter Chief of Police Kevin Zimmermann to discuss public safety. I will continue working to make sure our law enforcement officers have the tools and resources they need to keep our communities safe. #CA21 https://t.co/5ieoaCIIyn
Congratulations to @EnesFreedom on his nomination for a Nobel Peace Prize. Proud to support your efforts to bring awareness to human rights abuses around the world. https://t.co/At8T3oAPJZ

China has failed to hold up their end of the bargain on our trade agreement by nearly $16 billion. I'm requesting President Biden take action to hold China accountable and protect fair market access for American farmers, ranchers, and producers. #CA21 https://t.co/QcyBr6OL6K

Had a great meeting with @UnitedHealthCen yesterday to discuss their work in the Central Valley and how we can work together to expand healthcare access for residents in our rural communities. #CA21 https://t.co/tid84AKHfX

The opioid epidemic continues to harm communities across the nation, especially in the Central Valley. I urge this administration to permanently classify fentanyl as a Schedule I drug to provide law enforcement with the tools to combat this crisis. #CA21 https://t.co/PkvEXAwRde

I was honored to be recognized this weekend by the American Sikh Sangat for my support of the Sikh American community and the farmers protest in India. I am proud to be a voice and advocate for Sikh Americans in Congress. #CA21 https://t.co/4AFtoIxQYf

Today, around the world, we remember the lives of those lost in the Holocaust. Together, we honor the 6 million Jewish people, millions of other victims, and those who were forever changed by this tragic genocide. https://t.co/vLFR6ZEMtH

I was proud to recognize Zachary Ergo and Carson Yakligian as winners of the 2021 Congressional App Challenge for #CA21 at Kingsburg High yesterday. This annual competition encourages students to explore STEM education. Congratulations to Mr. Ergo and Mr. Carson on their success! https://t.co/AG9WA0AHf7

Katcho Achadjian was a friend and a great voice for his constituents, and it was an honor to serve alongside him in the CA State Assembly. I'm glad to see his memory honored by the naming of a portion of Hwy. 101 as the Katcho Achadjian Memorial Highway. https://t.co/MfpR676OHx

As a father of three, I understand that parents know the needs of their young students best. School choice empowers parents to make important decisions to support their children's education that reflect their family's needs. #CA21 https://t.co/rdKDQd6zYO

Damage to the Friant-Kern Canal has significantly limited its capacity to transport water to the farmers and families that rely on its deliveries. I was honored to attend today's groundbreaking ceremony to begin construction on much needed repairs to the canal. #CA21 https://t.co/jn5hwegStT

Grocery, gas, and utility costs are soaring as the Majority’s reckless policies lead to skyrocketing inflation. Last week, I cosponsored the Inflation Prevention Act to give responsible members of Congress the much-needed opportunity to block excessive spending. #CA21

Today, I sent a letter to @POTUS requesting immediate action to address the supply chain disruptions harming our agriculture exporters. These problems must be resolved to ensure our farmers in the Central Valley can continue to feed the world. #CA21 https://t.co/xNZCH1YVUb

Rather than defunding the police departments that protect our communities, I'm proud to cosponsor the Invest to Protect Act to invest dollars into giving the men and women who keep our families safe the resources they need to do their job. #CA21
https://t.co/iIpR9C7aTL

The deadline for @DeptofDefense to report on U.S. equipment left behind in Taliban-controlled Afghanistan passed last month, putting our national security at risk. Last week, my colleagues and I requested @SecDef complete this report immediately. #CA21 https://t.co/DUvgq9IVqS

I believe it is my responsibility as a member of Congress to give a voice to the unborn and defend life. I am proud to receive an A+ rating from @SBAList for my pro-life voting record. #CA21  https://t.co/MBeArTE9Y7

The Central Valley is home to a vibrant Armenian-American community which I am proud to represent in Congress. It was an honor to be recognized today by @AlenSimonyan in celebration of the 30th anniversary of our nations’ diplomatic relationship. #CA21 https://t.co/grV92KbrgN

Homelessness is a serious issue facing our veteran community and we must continue to support the men and women who served our country. I'm glad to see @USDOL announce a grant program to help veterans experiencing homelessness return to the workforce. #CA21 https://t.co/ZNTsidHdMS

I celebrated MLK Day with the MLK Community Intiative in Bakersfield for their annual breakfast this morning. I was honored to gather with the Bakersfield community for this special tradition. #CA21 https://t.co/5vINd2DBhh
Today, we honor the incredible life and legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and remember to uphold the principles he bravely defended. https://t.co/YccV0Jkvia

Today we visited an off-dock trucking facility with transloading capabilities. Since these trucking companies keep the ports moving, we had a productive discussion about what issues could be leading to congestion at the port and how those could be remedied. #CA21 https://t.co/lQU08qzKx1
Arrived at the Port of LA - discussing labor shortages with port officials, learning why terminals are struggling to keep up with high demand. #CA21 https://t.co/yuM0gTPt5l
Today I’m at the Port of Long Beach to see the supply chain crisis firsthand and learn what can be done to alleviate the problem. #CA21 https://t.co/uUmLgvdfK0

Congratulations to Mr. Zachary Ergo and Mr. Carson Yakligian for winning the 2021 Congressional App Challenge for California’s 21st Congressional District! I wish you both success as you continue your education, and I look forward to hearing of your future accomplishments. #CA21 https://t.co/QDOGV0i5fP

Donating blood is simple, easy, & essential. The wellbeing of thousands of patients in our communities is dependent on the faithful giving of blood donors like you. So, if you are healthy, go to https://t.co/R785hiyk3y & make an appointment today. @CenCABlood #CA21 #5GallonClub https://t.co/NHeWyzccqi

Winter is bringing much-needed rain & snowfall, giving CA opportunities to move water more responsibly as snowpack melts. Unfortunately, over 5M acre-feet of water was sent out to the ocean last year, which could've gone a long way for Central Valley communities & farmers. #CA21 https://t.co/P8NMiKT8jY

Today, inflation hit its highest rate in 40 YEARS. Meanwhile, President Biden and the Majority want to make it even worse by recklessly spending and implementing shortsighted economic policies. This is happening on their watch. #CA21 https://t.co/PdOyoSfrWt

If you or someone you know is a victim of human trafficking, call 1-888-373-7888. Know the signs - it could save a life. #HumanTraffickingAwarenessDay #CA21
https://t.co/RBF1IQflHg
On #LawEnforcementAppreciationDay, we honor the men and women of our law enforcement who sacrifice every single day to keep our communities safe. Thank you. #CA21 https://t.co/NblGrXbEW5

I was honored to be at American Legion Post 100 in Lemoore to honor Vietnam veterans in partnership with the United States of America Vietnam War Commemoration. It’s vital that every Vietnam veteran & their families understand the high esteem in which they are held. #CA21 https://t.co/ulVlUHWxTX

Met with West Hills Community College District Chancellor Kristin Clark and Lemoore Campus President James Preston to learn about their challenges with the pandemic and how they have retrofitted campus facilities and classrooms to accommodate hybrid learning styles. #CA21 https://t.co/RXyK6mhURW

I’m glad the USMCA panel settled in favor of the United States in this important proceeding. This trade agreement was negotiated to benefit America and Canada alike, and it is critical that U.S. dairy exporters are not unfairly restricted. #CA21 https://t.co/zrtWIhJMoa

Had a great meeting with Kings County Commission on Aging Executive Director Bobbie Wartson and Kings County Supervisor Joe Neves to learn about needed support for their Meals on Wheels Program and other nutritional programs serving the seniors across Kings County. #CA21 https://t.co/1LaUxgY1qo

Telehealth services are critical for seniors in our community, especially during this health crisis. I am proud to cosponsor the Telehealth Extension Act to extend telehealth services to Medicare beneficiaries, regardless of where they live. #CA21
Happy New Year! #CA21 https://t.co/hO41U9XV2m
Wishing everyone a safe and happy New Year’s Eve! #CA21

Today I toured the Bakersfield National Guard Gateway Readiness Center to learn more about the different programs offered. These programs will enhance soldier readiness and allow for significant cost savings by providing individual and collective training space. #CA21 https://t.co/syeHMpFV8i
Merry Christmas from my family to yours! #CA21 https://t.co/pNG3OFgJMy

Had a great year-end conversation with Selma city officials. We discussed their need for a new fire and EMS station, community center, and increased solar energy production. #CA21 https://t.co/PxGgfM7wUZ
Met with City of Fowler officials today to discuss their needs for new water infrastructure as well as a new police station and community center. #CA21 https://t.co/1Xma8XsyV9

Today I met with the Tulare County Fire Chief Charlie Norman to gain insight on the Sierra Nevada fires of 2021 and learn how the feds can better aid in fire prevention and protection. #CA21 https://t.co/IFOeqvo6Mk
I am so saddened to hear of the passing of Lori McClintock. Terra and I are praying for Tom and their children as they grieve.
Proud to help sponsor and take part in Grangeville Cemetery’s 3rd Annual Wreaths Across America event to honor and remember our fallen heroes. #CA21 https://t.co/nCr3MnzXbP

Met with Adrianne Hillman and her team at Salt and Light Works to learn about their upcoming projects to battle the homelessness crisis with a community neighborhood in Tulare County. #CA21 https://t.co/zbLK330YMO
Enjoyed meeting with Kern County Farm Bureau this morning - we discussed everything from water to what's going on in Washington. Thank you for having me. #CA21 https://t.co/TCnLOAm8vw

During the pandemic, CAPK has gone above and beyond to support the Kern County community, making sure families have food on their table during difficult times. The expansion of the CAPK Food Bank will allow them to continue to meet the growing needs of Kern families. #CA21 https://t.co/fDsmB1Vjwx

I cosponsored the Make Energy Affordable Act, requiring the Admin to create a report on rising energy prices. It’s important Americans understand how these failed energy policies are making it more expensive to drive your kids to school & keep your family warm this winter. #CA21
Congratulations to the Hanford Rebels, the 2021 Division 1 Pee-Wee Champions! #CA21 https://t.co/R7hU8WgwFf

The IRS backlog of unprocessed returns is unacceptable and places a serious burden on struggling families and small businesses. My colleagues and I requested IRS Commissioner Rettig report on the IRS's actions to resolve the issue ahead of the 2022 filing season. #CA21

.@CBP has a legal responsibility to distribute all antidumping duties & interest to those facing unfair foreign competition. I am happy to work with @RepJimmyPanetta by introducing a bill to support our domestic industries and address this issue. #CA21 https://t.co/81xBVo4AY0

The Accelerating Access to Critical Therapies for ALS Act passed the House yesterday. This bill will ensure people with terminal, rapidly progressing diseases like ALS are able to better access promising treatments. I am proud to support this impactful bill. #CA21

I’m proud to have cosponsored and voted for @RepAndyBarr’s Cardiovascular Advances in Research and Opportunities Legacy Act in honor of his wife Carol, an incredible wife and mother to his daughters. #CA21

The passage of the Ocean Shipping Reform Act in the House is an important step to creating fair trade practices for US farmers & exporters. I was proud to co-sponsor this legislation, & I urge my Senate colleagues to pass it as soon as possible. #CA21  https://t.co/EXtsawhdTj

In Congress, my most important duty is ensuring the safety of all Americans, including my constituents in #CA21. Today, with my support, the House of Representatives passed the final NDAA. Read my full statement below. https://t.co/QnJlQBXs66
Today, we remember and honor the 2,403 lives lost in the attack on Pearl Harbor. Eighty years later, their legacy of bravery and sacrifice lives on. #PearlHarborRemembranceDay https://t.co/eK4LGsjxkO

I want to thank my friend Devin Nunes for his service to the Central Valley, the state of California, and this great country. He played a vital role in getting me into public service, and I am incredibly grateful for his friendship and mentorship. #CA21 https://t.co/W9MG2BGRPv

It was great to meet with key leaders at the Fresno Economic Opportunities Commission today in Washington. We discussed a wide range of issues, including new ways to fight poverty and to invest in our Central Valley communities. #CA21 https://t.co/J6L9ZQpMj1

The cost of housing is rising, & grocery bills are historically high. In the Central Valley, gas prices are nearly $5 per gallon. Meanwhile, the Majority & the Admin continue to add to this problem with reckless spending & by implementing shortsighted economic policies. #CA21 https://t.co/8EoN7TxZ9g

Today I sent a letter to @POTUS concerning his recent Executive Orders related to the COVID-19 vaccine mandates. At a time when industries are desperately looking to hire employees, we cannot afford to be deterring people from looking for work. #CA21 https://t.co/cAnAYtQYgH

Today is #SmallBusinessSaturday - support small and local Central Valley businesses this holiday season and all year long. It’s a great way to support our community and invest in our local economy.  #CA21

I was honored to spend Thanksgiving with Mission of Kern County today. Thank you to the Mission staff and volunteers for serving some of the most vulnerable members of our community with consistency and generosity. #CA21 https://t.co/3WeNySL4lb
Happy Thanksgiving from my family to yours. #CA21 https://t.co/rlW7JkDuN3

.@POTUS asking the FTC to investigate energy companies is nothing more than a distraction from his dangerous and irresponsible energy policies at the root of the problem. If POTUS wants to reduce gas prices, he should allow the US to once again become energy independent. #CA21 https://t.co/WwzHzC1k3F
Today I had the opportunity to visit San Joaquin Valley College in Hanford to meet with faculty leaders to discuss issues important to the school. #CA21 https://t.co/ENXkEA2cpd
I am glad to hear that Prime Minister Narendra Modi intends to repeal India’s controversial agriculture laws. I am hopeful PM Modi keeps his word and sees this through for the farmers of India. #CA21

The Majority tried to pass their reckless trillion dollar spending spree in the middle of the night. Thanks to my good friend and neighbor @GOPLeader, the Majority had to wait until Americans were awake to witness this travesty. #CA21

The cost of the #BuildBackBetterAct will be paid for by hardworking, middle-class families struggling amid a global pandemic. It would be irresponsible to vote in favor of this, which is why I couldn't support this bill. Read my full statement below. #CA21 https://t.co/JExvJzdMy5

Thank you to everyone who tuned in to my telephone townhall last night. I enjoyed our discussion & hope I answered your questions. If you’d like to stay in touch and sign up for future telephone townhalls, please sign up to receive my newsletters at https://t.co/KjdegSPZSu #CA21 https://t.co/gfUsSZrHwp

While I respect Colombia’s investigation into milk powder imports, I am urging them not to adopt restrictive trade barriers that will hurt US dairy farmers. Our nations are critical trading partners, and any restrictions imposed by either country will only hurt our farmers. #CA21 https://t.co/FhZJqrhhCb

Inflation is rising at a 31-year high, yet the Majority wants to pass a multi-trillion dollar spending package. Today I joined my colleagues in standing against that package. The last thing middle class families need is to pay for this reckless spending for years to come. #CA21 https://t.co/hH5g6kwWgP

Telehealth is the future of medicine, and Congress should make it easier for people to access their doctors, not punish them through old and out of date regulations. I’m proud to support the Telehealth Expansion Act which will make Telehealth both accessible and permanent. #CA21 https://t.co/oPkwGKmoPd

The FBI’s counterterrorism tools are to be used to stop foreign and domestic attacks against our nation, not to track parents upset about their children’s education. The FBI should play no role in monitoring concerned parents. This must stop. #CA21 https://t.co/ZA55jOk8Wz

Human trafficking is one of the most heinous crimes imaginable, and Congress must do more to fight it.  I’m proud to cosponsor the Frederick Douglass Trafficking Victims Prevention and Protection Reauthorization to ensure victims are supported and traffickers are stopped #CA21

Despite requests for information, the administration has failed to respond by deadlines set by the CA GOP Delegation. In our most recent letter, we demand answers, digging deeper into why this anti-science, politically motivated decision was made. #CA21 https://t.co/HCi6aA1xCm

Stopped by the Knights of Columbus food bank at the Father Hannibal House in Sanger this morning - they host these drive-thru food banks about every two weeks. Thank you for giving back to the community! #CA21 https://t.co/E2V82qPldz

It was a privilege to be in Sanger today at Post 7168 to honor Vietnam veterans in partnership with the United States of America Vietnam War Commemoration. It is vital that every Vietnam veteran & their families understand the high measure of esteem in which they are held. #CA21 https://t.co/fYJPbykow5

Had a great time meeting with the Firebaugh chapter of FFA yesterday, which was recently named a 3-star chapter at the FFA National Convention. These young men and women were incredibly impressive. The future is bright for the Central Valley farming community. #CA21 https://t.co/amQR9dYV5U

Mental health is a huge issue in both our nation and our local communities. I am very glad I was able to meet with Dr. Lisa Lewis and UnChong Parry with Kings County Behavioral Health. We discussed the effects of the pandemic and services available to those in need. #CA21 https://t.co/uTkyjEHvxh

I had a great time meeting with Steve Mendoza and his team at the Kings Rehabilitation Center to discuss labor shortages and the need to support competitive employment opportunities for disabled individuals. #CA21 https://t.co/i7auT2vqBf

It was a pleasure to meet with Dave Clevenger today to discuss different ways to deal with CA’s low-income housing issues. Dave is a true leader who is committed to finding innovative ways to solve problems, and I’m proud to work with him. #CA21 https://t.co/GECo5rjzdB

Thank you to Corcoran Public Works for the effort they put into the remodeling of the Corcoran Veterans Memorial Building that will continue to recognize and serve those who fought for our freedoms. I was honored to attend the rededication ceremony yesterday. #CA21 https://t.co/d3wSGSplG8

Today we honor all the brave men and women who served in America's U.S. Armed Forces. Their dedication, bravery, and selfless service reminds us of what is best about America, and we are forever in their debt. To all our veterans, Happy Veterans Day! #CA21 https://t.co/dpsEfRehgI

Happy 246th birthday, @USMC. Today & every day, we celebrate our #Marines, past & present, & thank them for their unyielding loyalty, dedication, & courage. Freedom is not free, & our country is forever indebted to the history & legacy of the U.S. Marine Corps. #Semperfi #CA21 https://t.co/Y4T9sNfF3N

While our nation’s infrastructure is in desperate need of repair, I cannot, in good conscience, vote in favor of any part of this multi-trillion dollar package. Read my full statement at the link below. #CA21
https://t.co/wAyHYUHkz9

President Biden should not have the unilateral power to write checks for $450,000 to anyone on the taxpayer’s dime. I cosponsored @RepMcClintock’s bill that would prevent President Biden from doing just that. #CA21

We are facing horrific supply chain issues. Yet the Admin has no serious solutions to resolve this crisis. That is why I co-sponsored the TRANSPORT Act, to alleviate our supply chain issues & help our nations’ businesses return to normal operations. #CA21 https://t.co/ggYdZwBbYh

CA voters rejected the destructive policies in AB5 by voting for Prop 22. At a time when we should be supporting workers rebounding from the pandemic, the Majority wants to nationalize this policy, shutting off 59 million Americans' ability to earn when and how they want. #CA21 https://t.co/9qLiJ5zYSd

#CA21 is home to a proud immigrant community that values hard work, family, and perseverance, and I consider it the honor of my life to serve them in the House of Representatives. Thank you to the Hispanic Lobby Association for your work on behalf of Latino communities. https://t.co/IREUiDrkC9

I was honored to play in the Congressional Football Game last night. Members of Congress play Capitol Police to raise money for 3 great charities – The Capitol Police Memorial Fund, Our Military Kids, & A Advantage 4 Kids. We may have lost, but it was for a great cause! #CA21 https://t.co/ZQQfmfj3RR

Happy Diwali! #CA21 is home to a vibrant Indian-American community, and I am honored to represent these constituents in Congress. Today, I am proud to cosponsor a resolution to recognize the religious and historical significance of this important festival.

Today I joined my colleagues to call for a CBO score on the Build Back Better Act. The American people and Members of Congress should know exactly how a bill will affect our constituents before we vote on it. I urge Speaker Pelosi to allow for a CBO score before we vote #CA21 https://t.co/AdCgeWYiTP

November is #MilitaryFamilyAppreciationMonth, and I want to thank the families of our service members for the sacrifices they make every single day in support of our freedom. I remain committed to ensuring the needs of our military families are prioritized in Congress. #CA21 https://t.co/T6TNd3ZaUS
I was honored to attend Bakersfield’s 552nd celebration of Sikh religion founder Guru Nanak Dev Ji’s birthday today. I’m proud to represent a vibrant Sikh community in #CA21. https://t.co/QIH8lDbMwG
Delivered Super Bowl champ and colleague @RepBurgessOwens a @hopbeer tribute to fellow Raider, Sanger’s own NFL Hall of Fame, Tom Flores. #CA21 https://t.co/b9DCgVHlri

As the son of immigrants, I know firsthand the sacrifices so many make to come to America for a better life for their families. I am proud to represent so many hardworking immigrants from #CA21 in the House of Representatives. Please join me in celebrating #NationalImmigrantsDay.

The @NRDems have a responsibility to conduct oversight on what appears to be an anti-science, politically-motivated move by the Biden administration to discount years of peer-reviewed work done by career scientists and civil servants. #CA21 @NatResources 
https://t.co/XI71uTRA9W

In the midst of a drought, the Central Valley received substantial rain this week. We’re grateful for this rain. We need this rain. But we need the Biden Admin to understand the dire nature of our situation & take appropriate measures to capture our most precious resource. #CA21 https://t.co/irYaSnWDW5

I joined @RepMcCaul, @RepCuellar and the U.S.-Mexico Interparliamentary Group for a meeting with the Asociación de Empresarios Mexicanos to discuss the bilateral relationship, economic ties to California, and opportunities for business and workforce development. #CA21 https://t.co/q5VGtvuCvU
Thank you for being such a great role model for young athletes like my daughter. #CA21 https://t.co/I3dPgJwAzb

My colleagues and I sent a letter to President Biden and Governor Newsom requesting federal and state emergency declarations related to the drought and recent storms in California to maximize pumping of stormwater and unregulated flows in the Delta. #CA21
https://t.co/H4nhQslHx8

I extend a special thank you to the servicemembers and families of the VFA-2 Bounty Hunters, VFA-113 Stingers, VFA-147 Argonauts, & VFA-192 Golden Dragons deployed aboard the USS Carl Vinson. We are all praying for your safety and swift return home. #FreeandOpenIndoPacific #CA21 https://t.co/dDOLhJAFy3

Today is #NationalDayoftheDeployed, and I hope you’ll join me in saying thank you to our military serving abroad and their families who keep things running at home in their absence. Several NAS Lemoore families in #CA21 are facing the challenges of deployment today. https://t.co/vMHgtcxupw

Following the retirement of Police Chief Nevarez, former-deputy Tyson Davis was sworn-in as Delano’s new chief. I wish you the best of luck in the new position. Thank you for your service Chief Nevarez & congratulations Chief Davis! #CA21

The 13 service members killed during the Afghanistan evacuation made the ultimate sacrifice for our nation. That's why I'm proud to co-sponsor the Congressional Gold Medal Bill, giving these heroes the honor they deserve. Their courage and bravery will never be forgotten. #CA21 https://t.co/xwDkszyo4X

I'm glad Cal Trans has included funding to widen the 6-mile gap of Hwy 41 in their draft funding plan. This will not only save lives, it will improve commerce and ease travel. I will do everything in my power to secure federal funds for this project. #CA21 https://t.co/5lkDU6RDet

The Biden Admin made the reckless & partisan decision to begin re-consultation of the 2019 BiOps. The proposed interim operations plan represents a huge step backward in our effort to protect, restore, & enhance the Delta ecosystem & provide reliable water supplies. #CA21 https://t.co/oormQpZ6OT

I oppose President Biden’s proposal allowing the IRS to snoop on the bank accounts of ordinary Americans. In addition to violating Americans' privacy, it is a waste of taxpayer money, taking away resources from targeted enforcement against high-level tax evaders. #CA21

Today I led the entire CA GOP Delegation in sending a letter to DOI @SecDebHaaland & DOC @SecRaimondo expressing grave concerns with the proposed interim operations plan for the CVP and the SWP. To say I’m angry would be an understatement. #CA21 https://t.co/HhUrW0TwZF

Under President Biden, Americans are paying far more for basic needs like electricity & heating, gas to fill their cars, food to feed their families, and shoes to clothe their children. Inflation isn't temporary - it has lasting negative effects, & it's hurting real people. #CA21

I am saddened to hear about the passing of General Colin Powell. Helping to shape 21st century American policy, he was dedicated to keeping America safe. He will be remembered as a selfless public servant who served the American people with honor & distinction. #CA21

The deadline for Service Academy Nomination Applications is in TWO weeks. Students seeking my nomination to a Service Academy must submit their application to my Hanford office by Nov 1 at 5 pm. For questions, please call my office at 559-460-6070. #CA21 https://t.co/wpbvGdhtxY

This week, we learned that Arvin has finally achieved a return to safe arsenic health standards for drinking water. Having healthy drinking water is a basic need, and now the 20,000 people of Arvin know their drinking water is safe. #CA21 https://t.co/oJ0JplKALx

It is critical social security requests are processed and in-person services resume. My colleagues and I sent a letter to Acting Social Security Commissioner Kijakazi and @AFGENational President Kelley requesting Social Security field offices safely reopen immediately. #CA21

Today we recognize farmers, past and present, for their dedication to feeding not only California, but our entire nation. Farmers are the backbone of America, and I am proud to represent so many of them in Congress. #NationalFarmersDay #CA21 https://t.co/gTng3bqHAo

Yesterday I met with the Kings County Department of Public Health to discuss the county's challenges with COVID-19 as well as Kettleman City’s recent declaration of a water supply emergency. #CA21 https://t.co/J0sqdR2rt7

If you’re in the Hanford area and your phone lines and internet are down, please be advised that Comcast is expecting to be back online at 1:30pm. I will continue to post updates as my team receives them. #CA21

Stopped by Home Garden Community Services District to meet with General Manager Latoya Tate. We discussed their current water concerns and future plans to adapt to increasing pumping restrictions. We also discussed the need for more low-income housing in the area. #CA21 https://t.co/RM7LCd0676
Today I met with Breaking the Chains in Fresno to learn more about their work to help victims of human trafficking. Thank you for what you are doing in our community. #CA21 https://t.co/pKU9yzIada

Had a productive meeting with Parlier Unified School District leadership this afternoon. We discussed a number of topics, including the importance of technical career pathway opportunities for young students. #CA21 https://t.co/FJWWq8agj7

The California Republican Delegation strongly opposes the Biden Administration’s reckless, anti-scientific, and politically-motivated attempt to rewrite the 2019 biological opinions. Read our full statement here: 
#CA21
https://t.co/hjJfarBdpG

Congress has been back in session for over one week, and still, the Majority refuses to address the drought. It is disappointing that the Majority does not share my priority of taking care of the families in rural CA and supporting the farmers that feed our entire nation. #CA21 https://t.co/5ShBrsNQAK
